    @allure.title("Validate master data snapshot report for cleaning agent")
    @allure.description("This test case test API to validate the master data snapshot report for cleaning agent with "
                        "excel file data")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/85zt9qzmh")
    @pytest.mark.validate_master_data_snapshot_report_cleaning_agent
    def test_validate_master_data_snapshot_report_cleaning_agent(self):
        data = {}
        mismatched_rows = []
        assert_flag = False
    
        data.update({"sheet_name": "CleaningAgents"})
    
        master_data_snapshot = self.get_audit_portal.test_config_new_master_data_snapshot_report(data)["response"]
    
        if master_data_snapshot:
            master_data_snapshot = pd.json_normalize(master_data_snapshot)
    
            columns_mapping = {"externalId": "Id", "ade": "ADE(mg)", "amId": "AM Id", "ld50": "LD50 (mg/kg)",
                               "name": "Name", "toxicology": "Toxicology Configured As (ADE/LD50)",
                               "samplingRequired": "Take Samples during Validation (Yes/No)"}
    
            excel_data = pd.read_excel(const.get_master_data(), sheet_name="cleaning agent", usecols='A:G', nrows=3)
            allure.attach(excel_data.to_html(), name="excel_data", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
    
            api_df = master_data_snapshot[columns_mapping.keys()]
            excel_df = excel_data[columns_mapping.values()]
            allure.attach(excel_df.to_html(), name="excel_df", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
    
            api_df_sorted = api_df.sort_values(by=list(columns_mapping.keys())).reset_index(drop=True)
            excel_df_sorted = excel_df.sort_values(by=list(columns_mapping.values())).reset_index(drop=True)
    
            columns_to_convert = ['ade', 'ld50']
            api_df_sorted[columns_to_convert] = api_df_sorted[columns_to_convert].apply(pd.to_numeric, errors='coerce')
    
            allure.attach(excel_df_sorted.to_html(), name="excel_df_sort", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
            allure.attach(api_df_sorted.to_html(), name="api_sort", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.HTML)
    
            api_df_sorted = api_df_sorted.rename(columns=columns_mapping)
    
            max_rows = max(len(api_df_sorted), len(excel_df_sorted))
    
            numeric_columns = api_df_sorted.select_dtypes(include=np.number).columns
            string_columns = api_df_sorted.select_dtypes(include=object).columns
    
            for row in range(max_rows):
                if row >= len(excel_df_sorted):
                    mismatched_rows.append(row)
                    continue
    
                for column in string_columns:
                    api_value = api_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
                    excel_value = excel_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
                    comparison_successful = True
                    comparison_successful &= compare_portal(api_value, excel_value, column, row)
                    if not comparison_successful:
                        mismatched_rows.append(row)
                        break
    
                for column in numeric_columns:
                    api_value = api_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
                    excel_value = excel_df_sorted.loc[row, column]
>                   comparison_successful &= compare_portal(api_value, excel_value, column, row)

response_value = nan, excel_value = 4, column = 'LD50 (mg/kg)', row = 0

    def compare_portal(response_value, excel_value, column, row):
        error_message = f"Mismatch in column '{column}' at index ({row})"
    
        if response_value == "-" and math.isnan(excel_value):
            return True
    
        if str(response_value) != "#N/A" and str(excel_value) != "#N/A":
            if isinstance(response_value, (int, float)) and isinstance(excel_value, (int, float)):
                if math.isnan(response_value) or math.isnan(excel_value):
                    return True
                if response_value < 1:
                    length = (floor(log10(response_value)) - 1)
                else:
                    length = 15 - len(str(int(response_value)))
                if length < 0:
                    response_value = (round(response_value, -length + 3))
                    excel_value = (round(excel_value, -length + 1))
                    assert response_value == excel_value, error_message + " " + str(
                        response_value) + " Not Equal " + str(excel_value)
                else:
                    response_value = round(response_value, 3)
                    excel_value = round(excel_value, 3)
                    assert response_value == excel_value, error_message + " " + str(
                        response_value) + " Not Equal " + str(excel_value)
            else:
>               assert str(response_value).lower() == str(excel_value).lower(), error_message + " " + str(
                    response_value) + " Not Equal " + str(excel_value)
E               AssertionError: Mismatch in column 'LD50 (mg/kg)' at index (0) nan Not Equal 4
